verbs.description: President Donald Trump , North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: will] meet face to face for the first time Tuesday morning in Singapore .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump , North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARGM-MNR: face to face] [ARGM-TMP: for the first time Tuesday morning] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] .
